title: Caprese Salad
instructions:
1. Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a serving platter.
2. Tuck fresh basil leaves between the tomato and mozzarella slices.
3. Drizzle balsamic vinegar and olive oil over the salad.
4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Serve immediately as a side dish or appetizer.
